And þat it was purgatorie&punctelev;and þe Men &slong;oulene were

Þat muche habbez of dede&slong;
godes Godes
&punctelev; and deleth þare of ful &slong;male
Ake þenchez &yogh;wane hu&ydot; riche beoth&punctelev;to &yogh;elden it wel iwis
Þe &slong;oule longueth þare afturward&punctelev;þat in purgato&rrot;ie is
heo abidez longue heo&rrot;e riche&slong;&slong;e&punctelev;þe guode is euere bi hinde
hu&ydot; &slong;chullen gon adeouele we&ydot;&punctelev;and þare heo&rrot;e miede finde
Nou Ihesus þat us deo&rrot;e bou&yogh;hte&punctelev;þei we don ofte amis
On alle cri&slong;tine Cristine &slong;oulene haue merci&punctelev;and b&rrot;ing us to heuene blis
And led us to oure ri&yogh;hte heritage&punctelev;fo&rrot; þou bou&yogh;hte&slong;t us þar to
Neleos nou&yogh;ht þat þou deo&rrot;e bou&yogh;hte&slong;t&punctelev;þei we&slong;umdel mi&slong;do
